skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialize in creating engaging user experiences through HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. My expertise includes developing responsive and intuitive interfaces using the framework React, ensuring seamless navigation and visual appeal.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: With proficiency in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, I excel at building backend systems that power dynamic web applications. My skills in server-side programming and API development contribute to scalable and efficient backend solutions.

skills.title: Marketing
skills.description: I have a strong background in market research, campaign optimization, and social media management. My expertise extends to creating Google research with keyword analysis, SEO, analyzing data for insights, and creating effective marketing strategies.
